name: Cubeman Alpha
description:
Cubeman is a typical platform game, which will draw you into the undiscovered world of colours and music. You will experience adventure with a small cube, which is looking for answers to its questions.

(Alpha version only contains a short extract from the Cubeman story.)

► http://www.cubeman.eu/
► http://www.rebgaming.com/video-game-review/review-cubeman/

► **System requirements:**
Operating system - Windows Vista,7
Graphics card - AMD Mobility Radeon HD 5000 or better, Nvidia GeForce GTX 260 or better
Processor - Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 ghz
Ram - 4GB (minimum)

► **Alpha 1.1 version updates:**
- Window mode
- Cubeman face changes as he comes accross different situations
- 3 new maps
- updated gameplay
- new music
- on and off sound button
- reduced size of the installation file
- removed cursor in cutscenes
- updated timing

つ ◕_◕ ༽つ **Thanks for all your support!!!**
